results.content: Great course it reminds me of the IM 2.0  package. The only difference is you get a certificate of completion.
results.content_html: Great course it reminds me of the IM 2.0 package. The only difference is you get a certificate of completion.

results.content: Even though there are areas still to be added (after all, this course is over 2 years old now and some of cPanel has changed since this was created), the instructor is clear and concise, even with an accent, I was able to follow along. I would not call this a course for total beginners, as a few important explanations are not included, but all in all, it's a solid course about cPanel.
results.content_html: Even though there are areas still to be added (after all, this course is over 2 years old now and some of cPanel has changed since this was created), the instructor is clear and concise, even with an accent, I was able to follow along. I would not call this a course for total beginners, as a few important explanations are not included, but all in all, it's a solid course about cPanel.

results.content: simple and clear explanation for beginners
The starting shows the basic ins and outs of CPAnel which is a good start for anybody looking to learn CPanel from the beginning.
